## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                | Type             | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------- | ------- |
| `brand`  | `brand`   | The brand of the logo. Either six or bme. Defaults to six. | `"bme" \| "six"` | `'six'` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name       | Description             |
| ---------- | ----------------------- |
| `--height` | The height of the logo. |
